snippet: The new mayor said on Twitter that the Republican candidate’s “ignorant view of Islam could make both our countries less safe.”
abstract: Sadiq Khan, mayor of London and first Muslim to hold position, criticizes Donald Trump for inflammatory rhetoric about Islam that he says threatens security in United States and Great Britain.

byline.contributor: Sewell Chan contributed reporting from London.

lead_paragraph: The new mayor said on Twitter that the Republican candidate’s “ignorant view of Islam could make both our countries less safe.”

headline.main: Sadiq Khan, London’s Mayor, Hits Back at Donald Trump’s Comments on Islam
headline.print_headline: New Mayor of London Lashes Out at Trump
